Our Services

1. Package Dispatch & Collection

This service is tailored for retail businesses who in order to complete the transaction must deliver the purchased item to the client. It is also ideal for businesses that send out seasonâ€™s packages and PR packages.

We offer 2 variations of the service

a). Within the hour deliveries: For food & beverage, medication, flowers and any other products that would be required urgently.

b). Scheduled deliveries: is for clients that like to dispatch all their packages at once. This is often at a scheduled time mostly at the end of the day (for same day deliveries) or in the morning (for next day deliveries).

2. Mail Management

Tailored for corporates that require mail delivered or picked up. We base this service on the fact that most important transactions often require the exchange of hard copy documents;

a). We create a system that enables our clients trace the chain of custody of their mail and ensure accurate and timely deliveries.

b). We pick up and drop off documents at designated places and where need be, our riders will wait for return copies.
